meanings.definition: The act of mixing together different elements
meanings.sent1: The intermixture of colors created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The chef's secret sauce contained a unique intermixture of spices.
meanings.sent3: The intermixture of silly jokes and serious topics made the presentation entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her music was an intermixture of classical melodies and modern beats.
meanings.sent5: The intermixture of scents in the garden was overwhelming but pleasant.

meanings.definition: A mixture of different substances or elements
meanings.sent1: The intermixture of fruits in the salad was refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The potion required a precise intermixture of ingredients to work effectively.
meanings.sent3: The intermixture of flavors in the ice cream was surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: The intermixture of cultures in the city created a vibrant community.
meanings.sent5: The intermixture of voices in the choir harmonized beautifully.
